pkgmetadata.longdescription: Creates a Friendly User Interface for Emails Sending in 'shiny' // Allows the user to generate a friendly user interface for emails sending. The user can choose from the most popular free email services ('Gmail', 'Outlook', 'Yahoo') and his default email application. The package is a wrapper for the 'Mailtoui' 'JavaScript' library. See https://mailtoui.com/#menu for more information.
